value.fullName: Rodded the drain to clear a blockage.
value.label: Rodded the drain to clear a blockage.

value.fullName: Cleaned the pipe using high pressure jetting to reduce the risk of a repeat blockage.
value.label: Cleaned the pipe using high pressure jetting to reduce the risk of a repeat blockage.

value.fullName: Removed the roots from the drain.
value.label: Removed the roots from the drain.

value.fullName: Checked the drains, we found no issues with them.
value.label: Checked the drains, we found no issues with them.

value.fullName: The flooding was caused by heavy rain, we have recorded this on our system so that. we can build a history. If flooding happens again, please let us know.
value.label: The flooding was caused by heavy rain, we have recorded this on our system so that. we can build a history. If flooding happens again, please let us know.

value.fullName: Carried out a camera survey of the drains, one of our technicians will review the footage and contact you within seven days if further work is required.
value.label: Carried out a camera survey of the drains, one of our technicians will review the footage and contact you within seven days if further work is required.
